jobTitle: Demand and Supply Planner -   Remote | WFH
description:
Are you a numbers wizard with a knack for planning?

We're looking for a Demand and Supply Planner to join our team and help us keep things running smoothly. In this role, you'll be the master of balancing supply and demand, ensuring our products are always available to our customers.

What You'll Do

Forecast demand and optimize inventory levels

Manage order scheduling and allocation

Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams

Analyze data to identify trends and improve processes

Resolve order issues and ensure customer satisfaction

What You'll Need

At least 5 years of experience in supply chain and order management

A degree in supply chain, business, engineering, or a related field (an MBA is a plus!)

Advanced Excel skills (PowerPoint and Word are handy too)

Experience With MRP/ERP Systems (NetSuite Is Preferred)

Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

A love for juggling multiple tasks and meeting deadlines

Why You'll Love It

Work from anywhere! This is a fully remote position.

Join a dynamic team that values your input.

Enjoy a competitive salary and benefits package.

If you're ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role, we can't wait to hear from you!

Employment Type: Full-Time
responsibilities:
Forecast demand and optimize inventory levels
Manage order scheduling and allocation
Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams
Analyze data to identify trends and improve processes
Resolve order issues and ensure customer satisfaction
